ingredients.content: 800 g chicken breasts, skinless, sliced (2 cm)

preparations.content: Place olive oil, sweet paprika, 2 tsp salt, black pepper, garlic powder and dried thyme in mixing bowl and mix <b>20 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer 3 Tbsp of this mixture to a small bowl and set aside.
Add cayenne pepper, coriander and dried parsley to mixing bowl and stir <b>5 sec/speed 3<b>.
Add sliced chicken breasts and stir <b>10 sec//speed 1<b>. Transfer to a bowl and allow to marinate for 15 minutes (this time can be used for preparing the potatoes).

Place water and remaining 2 tsp salt in mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket and add potatoes. Set Varoma dish in position, arrange marinated chicken in Varoma dish and on Varoma tray, close Varoma and steam <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Set Varoma aside and remove simmering basket with aid of spatula. Transfer potatoes to a serving dish. Reserve cooking liquid and set aside.
Place reserved herb-oil mixture, wine vinegar, sugar, dried basil and 100 g of reserved cooking liquid in mixing bowl and mix <b>3 sec/speed 3<b>.
Add cherry tomatoes and rocket to serving dish containing potatoes then pour dressing over salad. Combine gently using spatula. Serve chicken with the warm potato salad.
